participant_abstract.sent: Project manager opened meeting with notes from last meetings.
Two designers gave our presentation of the playdoh modles we constructed of the remote controls.
Group agreed that our models were consistant with the groups desgin.
Project manger reviewed finacial constrants from the head office, but we were just within budget.
Marketing went through an evaluation surey and we all ranked out group as effectively working together in all the contrants to create a quality product.

participant_actions.sent: There will be no more meetings.

participant_decisions.sent: Final shape of remote was decided, models were presented and approved.
Evaluation - we evaluated the groups proccess and gave ourselves high marks.

participant_problems.sent: There were some slight budget problems but we were able to keep within the company's financial restraints.
